channel.title: web on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in web on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: For Some Definition of “Reusable”
item.description: I read “Why I switched to Pylons after using Django for six months” yesterday, and it mirrors something I’ve been thinking about off and on for the past year or so: what is the right level of abstraction for reuse in web applications?
